lead_paragraph: At least two people were killed and about a dozen others were injured after the tornado swept through the town, which is northwest of Chicago and has a population of about 150.

headline.print_headline: Crews Continue Search for Survivors After Tornado in Fairdale, Illinois
headline.main: Crews Continue Search for Survivors After Tornado in Fairdale, Illinois
